text: Peter Ross (born 2 September 1992) is a Scottish cricketer. He is a right- handed batsman and a right-arm fast medium bowler. He made his first class debut for Leeds/Bradford MCC University against Yorkshire on 1 April 2014. Ross played previously five One day cricket matches for the Scotland national cricket team under-19s team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish cricketers Category:Leeds/Bradford MCCU cricketers
title: Peter Ross (cricketer)
